skill.Name: Strength
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attack by 5%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Strength 2
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attack by 10%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Strength 3
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attack by 15%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Strength 4
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attack by 20%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Strength T
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attack by 25% when HP is over 75%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Magic
skill.Description EN: Increases spell attack by 5%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Magic 2
skill.Description EN: Increases spell attack by 10%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Magic 3
skill.Description EN: Increases spell attack by 15%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Magic 4
skill.Description EN: Increases spell attack by 20%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Magic T
skill.Description EN: Increase spell attack by 25% only when TP over 75%Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Rise Attack
skill.Description EN: Increases damage by consuming TP.

skill.Name: Heavy Hit
skill.Description EN: Increases chance of stunning an enemywith a physical attack.

skill.Name: Swords Up
skill.Description EN: Increases P. ATK when a sword is equipped.

skill.Name: Axes Up
skill.Description EN: Increases P. ATK when an axe is equipped.

skill.Name: Combatir
skill.Description EN: Increases the strength of an attackwhen an axe is equipped.

skill.Name: Raynard
skill.Description EN: Increases the strength of an attackwhen a hammer is equipped.

skill.Name: Light Force
skill.Description EN: Increases the strength of a spellwhen a light bow is equipped.

skill.Name: Rival Surge
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases all stats temporarilywhen Yuri defeats an enemy in battle.

skill.Name: Rival Surge 2
skill.Description EN: When Yuri enters Over Limit, occasionally enterthe same Over Limit level.

skill.Name: Assassin
skill.Description EN: Increases attacks and lessen damagereceived against humanoid enemies.

skill.Name: Bug Busters
skill.Description EN: Increases the amount of damage dealtand received for insect type enemies.

skill.Name: Hunter
skill.Description EN: Increases attacks and lessen damagereceived against aerial enemies.

skill.Name: Aerial Force
skill.Description EN: Increases damage by 1.2 times againstaerial enemies.

skill.Name: Hero
skill.Description EN: Increases attacks and lessen damagereceived against non-humanoid enemies.

skill.Name: Second Attack
skill.Description EN: Karol’s attacks inflict more damageon the enemy after the 2nd hit.

skill.Name: Critical
skill.Description EN: Increases the chance of inflicting critical damage.

skill.Name: Critical Break
skill.Description EN: Increases chance of guard breaks.

skill.Name: Sustained Critical
skill.Description EN: All attacks inflict critical damage during Over Limit.

skill.Name: Charming Thrust
skill.Description EN: Occasionally inflicts Charm on an enemyupon a successful hit.

skill.Name: Sleepy Thrust
skill.Description EN: Occasionally inflicts Sleep on an enemyupon a successful hit.

skill.Name: Stinger Blow
skill.Description EN: Occasionally paralyzes an enemy with a normal attack.

skill.Name: TP Attack
skill.Description EN: Inflicts damage on enemy TP with normal attacks.

skill.Name: Elemental
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases effect of a physicalattack with elemental attributes.

skill.Name: Critical Magic
skill.Description EN: Inflicts Critical Damage when casting a spell.

skill.Name: Stun Magic
skill.Description EN: Increases chance of stunning an enemywith a spell attack.

skill.Name: Shine
skill.Description EN: Occasionally stuns an enemy duringOver Limit.

skill.Name: Heavy Magic
skill.Description EN: Increases power of a spell. Also increasesTP consumption and cast time.

skill.Name: Light Magic
skill.Description EN: Decreases TP consumption and cast time.Also decreases the spell’s power.

skill.Name: Over Cast
skill.Description EN: Hold  after casting to increase theeffect of a novice spell while consuming TP.

skill.Name: Over Cast 2
skill.Description EN: Hold  after casting to increase theeffect of an intermediate spell while consuming TP.

skill.Name: Over Cast 3
skill.Description EN: Hold  after casting to increase theeffect of an advanced spell while consuming TP.

skill.Name: Aerial Artes
skill.Description EN: Able to perform base artes in mid-air.

skill.Name: Aerial Artes 2
skill.Description EN: Able to perform arcane artes in mid-air.

skill.Name: Aerial Artes 3
skill.Description EN: Able to perform certain altered artes in mid-air.

skill.Name: Aerial Finish
skill.Description EN: Increases the bonus for a blue Fatal Strike.

skill.Name: High Combo
skill.Description EN: Links a jump attack and a ground attack.

skill.Name: Change Style
skill.Description EN: Changes a normal attack depending on thedistance between enemies.

skill.Name: Change Style 2
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte attack depending on thedistance between enemies.

skill.Name: Bullfight Mind
skill.Description EN: Increases the power of close range normal attacksused with the Change Style skill.

skill.Name: Steal Plus
skill.Description EN: Increase the success rate of Thievery.

skill.Name: Combo Plus
skill.Description EN: Adds 1 more hit to a regular attack.

skill.Name: Combo Plus 2
skill.Description EN: Adds 2 more hits to a regular attack.

skill.Name: Combo Plus 3
skill.Description EN: Adds 3 more hits to a regular attack.

skill.Name: Combo Plus Advance
skill.Description EN: Adds one more hit to a normal attack when inAdvance or Critical Form.

skill.Name: Step Combo
skill.Description EN: Press  during a backstepto perform a jump attack.

skill.Name: Dragon Buster
skill.Description EN: Press  +  during a jump totrigger a Dragon Buster attack.

skill.Name: Mighty Charge
skill.Description EN: Press and hold  to increase the strength of an attack on the first hit.

skill.Name: Charge Hold
skill.Description EN: Maintain a charged Mighty Charge even aftera missed attempt.

skill.Name: Charge Hold 2
skill.Description EN: Maintain a charged Mighty Charge for a fixed amount of time.

skill.Name: Speed Charge
skill.Description EN: Increases the speed of charging up a Mighty Charge.

skill.Name: Charge Smash
skill.Description EN: Guard Break enemy defenses duringMighty Charge. Super Armor excluded.

skill.Name: Attack Arte Charge
skill.Description EN: Able to store up attacks for offensive artes.Must have Mighty Charge set.

skill.Name: Endless Shot
skill.Description EN: Release arrows continuously by holding .Occasionally knocks back enemies.

skill.Name: Combo Voltage
skill.Description EN: Recovers TP after 2 consecutive 3-hit combos.Also recovers after combos in multiples of 3.

skill.Name: Combination
skill.Description EN: Increases damage once for a combo: 3-hit normal → base → arcane

skill.Name: Combination 2
skill.Description EN: Increases damage and OL Gauge once for a combo: 3-hit normal → base → altered → arcane

skill.Name: Combination 3
skill.Description EN: Increases damage and recovers TP for a combo: 3-hit normal → base → altered → arcane → mystic

skill.Name: High Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 1 with a 28-hit combo.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 2 with a 50-hit combo.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Ultimate Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 3 with a 72-hit combo.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Perfect Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 4 with a 96-hit combo.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: High Fatal Tension
skill.Description EN: Enter Over Limit Lv. 1 when an FS is used in an FS chain of 4 or higher.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Fatal Tension
skill.Description EN: Enter Over Limit Lv. 2 when an FS is used in an FS chain of 7 or higher.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: High Magic Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 1 with a 48-hit combo using only spells.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Magic Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 2 with a 96-hit combo using only spells.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: High Aerial Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 1 with a 16-hit combo in mid-air.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Aerial Tension
skill.Description EN: Fills the Over Limit gauge to Lv. 2 with a 24-hit combo in mid-air.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Cross Counter
skill.Description EN: Damage increases when an attack hits anattacking enemy.

skill.Name: Safe Bet
skill.Description EN: Neither the worst nor the best effects will occur when usingartes with random effects.

skill.Name: Gambler's Soul
skill.Description EN: Increases the chance of activating both the best and the worsteffects for artes with random effects.

skill.Name: Critical Hitter
skill.Description EN: Drastically increases the likelihood of entering Critical Formwhen using Form Change.

skill.Name: Reflect
skill.Description EN: Reflects a certain amount of damagefrom an attack.

skill.Name: FS Bonus
skill.Description EN: Recovers HP every time a Fatal Strikehits an enemy.

skill.Name: FS Bonus 2
skill.Description EN: Recovers TP every time a Fatal Strikehits an enemy.

skill.Name: Fatal Exceed
skill.Description EN: Increases damage dealt by a Fatal Strike toenemies that do not die from it.

skill.Name: Hunter's Fang
skill.Description EN: Increases the bonus for a green Fatal Strike attack.

skill.Name: BA Force
skill.Description EN: Increases the effectiveness of Burst Artesattacks.

skill.Name: Burst Hold
skill.Description EN: Over Limit will not end while using a burstarte.

skill.Name: Lucky Limit
skill.Description EN: Occasionally fills the Over Limit gaugeafter a burst or mystic arte.

skill.Name: Limit Fever
skill.Description EN: Occasionally restarts Over Limit after itends.

skill.Name: Special
skill.Description EN: Trigger a mystic arte with Over Limit Lv. 3 or above.Hold  after an arcane arte or above.

skill.Name: Hit Plus
skill.Description EN: Tap  repeatedly during a mystic arteto add hits to the attack.

skill.Name: Team Work
skill.Description EN: After using a Mystic Arte, all party memberswill become Super Armed for 5 seconds.

skill.Name: HP Condition
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attacks slightly whenHP is more than 75% of the max amount.

skill.Name: HP Condition 2
skill.Description EN: Increases physical attacks whenHP is less than 25% of the max amount.

skill.Name: HP Condition 3
skill.Description EN: Increases spell attacks slightly whenHP is more than 75% of the max amount.

skill.Name: HP Condition 4
skill.Description EN: Increases spell attacks whenHP is less than 25% of the max amount.

skill.Name: One Man Show
skill.Description EN: Defeat all enemies single-handedly toreceive extra EXP.

skill.Name: Arte Smash
skill.Description EN: Increases Over Limit gauge when an enemy isdefeated with a base, arcane, or altered arte.

skill.Name: Magic Smash
skill.Description EN: Increases Over Limit gauge when an enemyis defeated with magic.

skill.Name: Burst Smash
skill.Description EN: Increases Over Limit gauge when an enemyis defeated with a burst arte.

skill.Name: Fighting Lens
skill.Description EN: Automatically use a Magic Lens when Patty defeats an enemynot already registered in the Monster Book.

skill.Name: Half Damage
skill.Description EN: Damage inflicted will be reduced to 1/2.

skill.Name: Quarter Damage
skill.Description EN: Damage inflicted will be reduced to 1/4.

skill.Name: Minimum Damage
skill.Description EN: Damage inflicted will be reduced to 1.

skill.Name: Chain
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Can be learnedif used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Hell Fire
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Can be learnedif used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Defend
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense by 5%. Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Defend 2
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense by 10%. Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Defend 3
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense by 15%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Defend 4
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense by 20%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Defend T
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense by 25% only whenHP is over 75%. Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Resist
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense by 5%. Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Resist 2
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense by 10%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Resist 3
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense by 15%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Resist 4
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense by 20%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Resist T
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense by 25% only when HP is over 75%. Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Critical Guard
skill.Description EN: Press  +  to guard while advancing.Nullifies enemy attacks if performed at the correct time.

skill.Name: Guard Impact
skill.Description EN: Stuns and reflects enemy attacks for a shortperiod with the success of a Critical Guard.

skill.Name: Magic Guard
skill.Description EN: Press  +  to decrease magic damagetaken. Effective only while button is held down.

skill.Name: Aerial Guard
skill.Description EN: Able to guard in mid-air.

skill.Name: Aerial Magic Guard
skill.Description EN: Able to use Magic Guard in mid-air.Stays in mid-air during the effect.

skill.Name: Guard Plus
skill.Description EN: Decreases the amount of damage takenwhile guarding.

skill.Name: Guard Plus 2
skill.Description EN: Decreases the amount of damage takenfrom the side or rear.

skill.Name: Magic Guard Plus
skill.Description EN: Reduces damage received while using Magic Guard.

skill.Name: Guard Reflect
skill.Description EN: Reflects 1/5 of the damage taken during guard.

skill.Name: Guard Artes
skill.Description EN: Cancels guard motion and performs an arte.Invincible to attacks for a short period of time.

skill.Name: Guard Artes 2
skill.Description EN: Recovers HP and TP when a Guard Artesskill hits an enemy.

skill.Name: Extend Guard
skill.Description EN: Gradually recovers HP during guard.

skill.Name: Guard Supply
skill.Description EN: Recovers TP if guarded from enemy attacks.

skill.Name: Roll
skill.Description EN: Decreases damage taken by halfwhen staggering.

skill.Name: Revenge Arrow
skill.Description EN: Release an arrow as  is pressed while staggering.

skill.Name: Anti Element
skill.Description EN: Occasionally decreases damage froman elemental attack by half.

skill.Name: Anti Break
skill.Description EN: Reduces the chance of Guard Break.

skill.Name: Super Guard
skill.Description EN: Reduce physical damage to 1 when guarding.Damage doubles if not guarding.

skill.Name: Super Resist
skill.Description EN: Reduce magic damage to 1 when guarding.Damage doubles if not guarding.

skill.Name: Guarding Skill
skill.Description EN: Reduces the chance of Guard Break even when continuingto guard.

skill.Name: Steel Defense
skill.Description EN: Reduce damage received to 10% when near K.O.

skill.Name: Status Guard
skill.Description EN: Reduces the effect of magical ailments.

skill.Name: Condition Guard
skill.Description EN: Reduces the effects of certain physical ailments.

skill.Name: Immunity
skill.Description EN: Reduces the chance of receiving status effects.

skill.Name: Lion Heart
skill.Description EN: Greatly increases resistance for all negativestatus effects.

skill.Name: Cure Area
skill.Description EN: Allies near Flynn automatically recoversfrom status effects occasionally.

skill.Name: Cure Guard
skill.Description EN: Recovers physical ailments by stayingin a guard position for a short period.

skill.Name: Guarding Cast
skill.Description EN: Reduces the chance of staggering when casting a spell.

skill.Name: Endure
skill.Description EN: Decreases the amount of time needed to recoverfrom a stagger hit.

skill.Name: Void Attack
skill.Description EN: Occasionally prevents staggeringwhen receiving a physical attack.

skill.Name: Void Magic
skill.Description EN: Occasionally prevents staggeringwhen receiving a magic attack.

skill.Name: Step Away
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering when hit during Backstep.

skill.Name: Escape Step
skill.Description EN: Nullifies all attacks during Backstep.

skill.Name: Guard All
skill.Description EN: Occasionally auto-guard against attacks from the rear.

skill.Name: Guard All 2
skill.Description EN: Gain ability to use Magic Guard to block both physical andmagic damage from enemies.

skill.Name: Absorption
skill.Description EN: Nullifies a spell attack when casting a spellof the same attribute.

skill.Name: Defend Artes
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering when hit during a base arte combo.

skill.Name: Defend Artes Advance
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering when hit during a base artecombo in Advance or Critical Form.

skill.Name: Burst Guard
skill.Description EN: Reduces the chance of staggering during burstartes.

skill.Name: Recovering Guard
skill.Description EN: Reduces the chance of staggering when usingRecover.

skill.Name: Resilience
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering while casting a spell.

skill.Name: Brainiac Grace
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering while casting a spell in Brainiacor Critical Form.

skill.Name: Anti Magic
skill.Description EN: Resist all magic effects. Recover, attack andenhance magic are all nullified.

skill.Name: Perfect Magic
skill.Description EN: Consumes TP gradually while all enemyspells are nullified.

skill.Name: Aerial Armor
skill.Description EN: Avoids staggering when hit while jumping.

skill.Name: Mobile Armor
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering when hit during Free Run.

skill.Name: Glory
skill.Description EN: Avoid staggering for any kind of attacks.

skill.Name: Escape Jump
skill.Description EN: Able to jump when cancelling guard.Becomes invincible for a short time.

skill.Name: TP Condition
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense slightlywhen TP is more than 75% of the max amount.

skill.Name: TP Condition 2
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense when TP isless than 25% of the max amount.

skill.Name: TP Condition 3
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense slightlywhen TP is more than 75% of the max amount.

skill.Name: TP Condition 4
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense when TP isless than 25% of the max amount.

skill.Name: Guardian
skill.Description EN: Reduces damage taken by allies when theyare guarding.

skill.Name: Survive
skill.Description EN: Cannot be KO’ed by any attacks while guarding.HP will always be at 1 while guarding.

skill.Name: Break Down
skill.Description EN: Hit a stunned enemy to extend Stun once.

skill.Name: Down Hit
skill.Description EN: Inflicts 1.2 times more damage when attackingan enemy that has been knocked down.

skill.Name: Heavy Weight
skill.Description EN: Body becomes heavy to prevent staggering.It also decreases speed.

skill.Name: Healing Arte Charge
skill.Description EN: Able to use charge attacks for healing artesonly when Mighty Charge is set.

skill.Name: Elemental Effect
skill.Description EN: Weather and climate will have a greatereffect on spells.

skill.Name: Heavy Arrow
skill.Description EN: Increases the effect of an arrow attack while the interval decreases. Limited to normal attacks.

skill.Name: Power Shot
skill.Description EN: Increases enemy staggering time.

skill.Name: Heavy Energy
skill.Description EN: Raises physical defense whena heavy bow is equipped.

skill.Name: Spear Master
skill.Description EN: Increases magic defense whena spear is equipped.

skill.Name: Rod Master
skill.Description EN: Increases physical defense whena rod is equipped.

skill.Name: OVL Concentrate
skill.Description EN: Cannot be stunned during Over Limit.

skill.Name: Hyper Guard
skill.Description EN: Enter Over Limit Lv. 1 once when guarding against a physical attack.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Magic Guard
skill.Description EN: Enter Over Limit Lv. 1 once when guarding against a magic attack.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Shield
skill.Description EN: Occasionally nullifies a physical attack.

skill.Name: Magic Shield
skill.Description EN: Occasionally nullifies a spell attack.

skill.Name: Devotion
skill.Description EN: Receive half the damage of a nearby ally during battle.

skill.Name: Energy Coat
skill.Description EN: Reduces damage of a physical attack.Consumes TP for every hit received.

skill.Name: Crucible
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Arte can be learned if used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Athenor
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Arte can be learned if used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Evade
skill.Description EN: Increases agility by 5%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Evade 2
skill.Description EN: Increases agility by 10%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Evade 3
skill.Description EN: Increases agility by 15%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Evade 4
skill.Description EN: Increases agility by 20%.Increase due to equipment not affected.

skill.Name: Just Soul
skill.Description EN: Temporarily increases physical and magic defense when afflictedwith status effects.

skill.Name: Item Thrower
skill.Description EN: Able to use items on an ally.

skill.Name: Item Pro
skill.Description EN: Decreases the amount of time character is unableto move after using items.

skill.Name: Item Pro 2
skill.Description EN: Allows character to move immediately after using an item.

skill.Name: Speedy Item
skill.Description EN: Items can be used immediately in a rowwithout cooldown time.

skill.Name: In Step
skill.Description EN: Increases the advancing distance duringa Critical Guard.

skill.Name: Backstep
skill.Description EN: Press  +  to Backstep.

skill.Name: Landing Step
skill.Description EN: Able to cancel action with a Backstep uponlanding. Can also Backstep repeatedly.

skill.Name: Long Step
skill.Description EN: Increases the Backstep distance.

skill.Name: Step Cancel
skill.Description EN: Able to cancel actions with Backstep.

skill.Name: Step Cancel F
skill.Description EN: Allows the delay after Form Change to be canceledwith Backstep.

skill.Name: Recover
skill.Description EN: While staggering, prevent being knockeddown by a hit with the guard button.

skill.Name: Recovery Artes
skill.Description EN: Able to move in mid-air after Recover.

skill.Name: Form Selection
skill.Description EN: Gain ability to select form when using Form Change.Press  for Advance,  for Brainiac, and  for Normal.

skill.Name: Form Hold
skill.Description EN: Begin the next battle with the previously used formwhen Patty delivers the finishing blow.

skill.Name: Dash
skill.Description EN: Increases moving speed during battle.

skill.Name: Dash Cancel
skill.Description EN: Able to cancel actions with free run.

skill.Name: Quick Turn
skill.Description EN: Able to turn around instantly even when dashing.

skill.Name: Runners
skill.Description EN: Recovers HP gradually during free run.

skill.Name: Runners 2
skill.Description EN: Recovers TP gradually during free run.

skill.Name: Run
skill.Description EN: Decreases the amount of time needed to escape.

skill.Name: Aerial Jump
skill.Description EN: Able to add a jump in mid-air.

skill.Name: Aerial Jump 2
skill.Description EN: Able to add 2 more jumps in mid-air.

skill.Name: Jump Cancel
skill.Description EN: Able to cancel actions with a jump.

skill.Name: Aerial OVL
skill.Description EN: Able to use Over Limits in mid-air.

skill.Name: Aerial Step
skill.Description EN: While in mid-air, press  + to back dash once.

skill.Name: Aerial Dash
skill.Description EN: While in mid-air, press  + to dash once.

skill.Name: Touch Down
skill.Description EN: Press  to land immediately whilein mid-air.

skill.Name: Landing
skill.Description EN: Reduces the amount of time character isunable to move after landing.

skill.Name: Levitation
skill.Description EN: Press  to fly during a jump. Use  or while moving to rise or fall and  to land.

skill.Name: Combo Force
skill.Description EN: Mitigates damage from a basic combo attack.

skill.Name: Extra Combo I
skill.Description EN: Press  at just the right time at the end ofa combo to inflict an extra hit on the enemy.

skill.Name: Extra Combo II
skill.Description EN: Press  at just the right time at the end of Extra Combo I to inflict another hit on your enemy.

skill.Name: Extra Combo III
skill.Description EN: Press  at just the right time at the end of Extra Combo II to inflict another hit on your enemy.

skill.Name: Aerial Combo
skill.Description EN: Adds 1 more hit to an aerial attack.

skill.Name: Aerial Combo 2
skill.Description EN: Adds 2 more hits to an aerial attack.

skill.Name: Aerial Combo 3
skill.Description EN: Adds 3 more hits to an aerial attack.

skill.Name: Quick Arrow
skill.Description EN: Shortens the amount of time needed tofire an arrow for normal attacks. But power decreases.

skill.Name: Long Range
skill.Description EN: Extends the attack range for bow & arrows.

skill.Name: Headhunter
skill.Description EN: Drastically increases the chance of stunning an airborneenemy when hitting it with an arrow.

skill.Name: Magic Combo
skill.Description EN: No casting time required when casting an altered arte immediately following the base spell.

skill.Name: Liner Shot
skill.Description EN: Basic attack will change to small energy shots.Capable of ranged attacks.

skill.Name: Spell Charge
skill.Description EN: Hold  after casting a novice spellto move freely while delaying the spell.

skill.Name: Spell Charge 2
skill.Description EN: Hold  after casting an intermediatespell to move freely while delaying the spell.

skill.Name: Spell Charge 3
skill.Description EN: Hold  after casting an advanced spellto move freely while delaying the spell.

skill.Name: Rhythm
skill.Description EN: Tap  repeatedly while casting spells to shorten casting time.

skill.Name: Randomize
skill.Description EN: Casting time of novice/intermediate spells willbe zero or doubled.

skill.Name: Recast
skill.Description EN: Resume casting the same spell if the spellwas interrupted.

skill.Name: Overheat
skill.Description EN: No casting time, with 1/8 th TP consumption for novicespells only when HP is below 120 and TP is over 60.

skill.Name: Speed Cast
skill.Description EN: Decreases spell casting time.

skill.Name: Brainiac Speed Cast
skill.Description EN: Decreases spell casting time in Brainiacor Critical Form.

skill.Name: Lucky End
skill.Description EN: Occasionally allows player to moveright after casting a spell.

skill.Name: Spell End
skill.Description EN: Able to move immediately after casting a spell.

skill.Name: Pow Hammer Revenge
skill.Description EN: Occasionally counter with Pow Hammerwhen attacked.

skill.Name: Revenge Spell
skill.Description EN: No casting time if a novice spell is usedwhile staggering.

skill.Name: Super Chain 4
skill.Description EN: Able to link base and altered artes.

skill.Name: Super Chain 5
skill.Description EN: Able to link altered and arcane artes.

skill.Name: Combo Magic
skill.Description EN: Able to link novice spells and base artes.

skill.Name: Combo Magic 2
skill.Description EN: Able to link intermediate spells with altered and arcane artes.

skill.Name: Brainiac Combo Magic
skill.Description EN: Able to link novice spells and base artes in Brainiacor Critical Form.

skill.Name: Brainiac Combo Magic 2
skill.Description EN: Able to link advanced spells with altered and arcane artesin Brainiac or Critical Form.

skill.Name: Super Chain
skill.Description EN: Able to link arcane and base artes.

skill.Name: Super Chain 2
skill.Description EN: Able to link arcane and altered artes.

skill.Name: Super Chain 3
skill.Description EN: Able to link altered and base artes.

skill.Name: Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow a base arte with a second basearte once per combo.

skill.Name: High Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow an altered arte with a second altered arte once per combo.

skill.Name: Hyper Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow an arcane arte with a second arcane arte once per combo.

skill.Name: Aerial Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow a base arte with a second base arte once permid-air combo.

skill.Name: Aerial High Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow an altered arte with a second altered arte onceper mid-air combo.

skill.Name: Aerial Hyper Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow an arcane arte with a second arcane arte onceper mid-air combo.

skill.Name: Rallying Cast
skill.Description EN: Healing artes require no casting time for a limited time afterrecovering from being knocked down.

skill.Name: O.L. Boost
skill.Description EN: Increases the duration of Over Limit.

skill.Name: High Tension
skill.Description EN: Increases rate at which Over Limit gauge fills.

skill.Name: High Taunt
skill.Description EN: Occasionally enter Over Limit Lv. 1 after taunting.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Taunt & Evade
skill.Description EN: Taunt an enemy to avoid being targeted.

skill.Name: Taunt Gamble
skill.Description EN: Taunt to raise or drop enemy status fora short time. There is a 50% chance of their status raising or falling.

skill.Name: Member Taunt
skill.Description EN: Over Limit gauge fills more quickly whentaunting near an ally.

skill.Name: Double Appeal
skill.Description EN: Taunt consecutively to fill Over Limit gaugemore quickly.

skill.Name: Fatal Finish
skill.Description EN: Recover full HP upon successfully completing aFatal Strike combo with a certain number of hits.

skill.Name: Fatal Finish Plus
skill.Description EN: Fully recovers HP and TP upon a successfulFatal Strike after a series of FS chains.

skill.Name: Speed Up
skill.Description EN: Increases the speed of normal attacksduring Over Limit.

skill.Name: Speed Up 2
skill.Description EN: Increases the speed of arte attacksduring Over Limit.

skill.Name: High Mobility
skill.Description EN: Enter Over Limit Lv. 1 once after running for a while.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Link Slash
skill.Description EN: Avoids entering a battle from a link encounter.

skill.Name: Motion Change
skill.Description EN: Changes standby and moving motion.

skill.Name: Play Dead
skill.Description EN: Hold  while knocked down torecover your HP and TP.

skill.Name: Holy Breath
skill.Description EN: Extends the amount of time Holy Bottle is in effect.

skill.Name: Dark Breath
skill.Description EN: Extends the amount of time Dark Bottle is in effect.

skill.Name: Encounter Bonus
skill.Description EN: Encounter an enemy symbol from the rear to occasionallyrecover the entire party's TP upon entering a battle.

skill.Name: OVL Boost Area
skill.Description EN: The speed of the OVL gauge fills up accordingto the number of allies near Flynn during battle.

skill.Name: S. Spell Area
skill.Description EN: Decreases casting time when near Flynnduring battle.

skill.Name: Critical Upgrade
skill.Description EN: Enter Critical Form after getting several jackpots fromusing artes with random effects.

skill.Name: Critical Upgrade 2
skill.Description EN: Enter Critical Form after using a mystic arte.

skill.Name: High Form Change
skill.Description EN: Enter Over Limit Lv. 1 when changing into Critical Form.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Form Change
skill.Description EN: Over Limit level increases by 1 when using Form Change duringOver Limit and entering Critical Form.

skill.Name: Advance Ability Plus
skill.Description EN: Follow a base arte with a second base arte once per comboin Advance or Critical Form.

skill.Name: Brainiac Magic Combo
skill.Description EN: No casting time required when casting an altered arte afterits original spell in Brainiac or Critical Form.

skill.Name: Brainiac Magic Selection
skill.Description EN: Select offensive artes with  or healing/support spells with when using random spells in Brainiac or Critical Form.

skill.Name: OVL Gamble
skill.Description EN: When activating Over Limit, occasionally enter Lv. 4 without depleting the gauge,or empty the entire gauge without entering Over Limit at all.

skill.Name: Female Company
skill.Description EN: Increases physical and magic attack and defense when the battleparty is entirely female.

skill.Name: Kids' Association
skill.Description EN: Increases the amount of Gald earned after battle when Karolis in the battle party.

skill.Name: Marksmen's Society
skill.Description EN: Increases the rate at which the Over Limit gauge fills when Ravenis in the battle party.

skill.Name: Blonde Universe
skill.Description EN: Increases resistance to status effects when Flynn is inthe battle party.

skill.Name: Dream Couple
skill.Description EN: Decreases TP consumption when Yuri is in thebattle party.

skill.Name: Mascot Soul
skill.Description EN: Increases item drop rate when Repede is in thebattle party.

skill.Name: Alembic
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Can be learnedif used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Gale
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Can be learnedif used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Vitality
skill.Description EN: Increases Max HP by 200.

skill.Name: Vitality 2
skill.Description EN: Increases Max HP by 400.

skill.Name: Vitality 3
skill.Description EN: Increases Max HP by 800.

skill.Name: Vitality 4
skill.Description EN: Increases Max HP by 1200.

skill.Name: Spirits
skill.Description EN: Increases Max TP by 20.

skill.Name: Spirits 2
skill.Description EN: Increases Max TP by 50.

skill.Name: Spirits 3
skill.Description EN: Increases Max TP by 100.

skill.Name: Spirits 4
skill.Description EN: Increases Max TP by 150.

skill.Name: Lucky Plus
skill.Description EN: Increases default luck by 15.

skill.Name: Lucky Plus 2
skill.Description EN: Increases default luck by 30.

skill.Name: Defend Conversion
skill.Description EN: Adds 25% of M. DEF value to P. DEF.

skill.Name: Resist Conversion
skill.Description EN: Adds 25% of P. DEF value to M. DEF.

skill.Name: Combat Force
skill.Description EN: Converts 25% of HP to the same amount of TP.If HP->75%, then TP->125%.

skill.Name: Item Amplifier
skill.Description EN: Increases duration and effect of items usedduring battle.

skill.Name: Item Amplifier 2
skill.Description EN: Increases duration and effect of items usedduring battle even more.

skill.Name: Lucky Item
skill.Description EN: Occasionally, item used will not be consumedafter it has been used.

skill.Name: Multi-Item
skill.Description EN: Single-target consumable healing items like gels and bottles affectall allies, however the effect is halved.

skill.Name: Full Check
skill.Description EN: Able to see all enemy info with a singleMagic Lens.

skill.Name: Scanning
skill.Description EN: Displays remaining HP over enemy withMagic Lens.

skill.Name: Inspector
skill.Description EN: Able to view enemy details when switchingtargets without using Magic Lens.

skill.Name: Aerial Tension
skill.Description EN: Recovers TP for every 3-hit combos in midair.

skill.Name: Medical Boost
skill.Description EN: Strength of cure spell proportional to remainingHP. Strength increases by 1.5 times with Max HP.

skill.Name: Medical Smash
skill.Description EN: Strength of heal arte proportional to remainingHP. Strength increases by 1.5 times with Max HP.

skill.Name: Heal Supply
skill.Description EN: Heal an ally to recover some HP.

skill.Name: Eternal Support
skill.Description EN: Effects of support magic occasionallylasts for duration of battle.

skill.Name: Eternal Weakness
skill.Description EN: Effects of weakening spell occasionally lastsfor duration of battle.

skill.Name: Support Arte Charge
skill.Description EN: Able to use charged attacks for supporttype artes. Only with Mighty Charge set.

skill.Name: Critical Recover
skill.Description EN: Recovers TP upon a critical hit.

skill.Name: Convert Absorption
skill.Description EN: Gain TP equal to an enemy’s HP right beforebeing hit by a spell attack.

skill.Name: Healing Artes
skill.Description EN: Occasionally casts healing spells withoutconsuming any TP.

skill.Name: Lucky Magic
skill.Description EN: Occasionally decreases the amount ofTP consumption when casting a spell.

skill.Name: Reducer
skill.Description EN: Decreases TP consumption when same spellis used consecutively.

skill.Name: HP Recover
skill.Description EN: Increases the amount of HP recovered.

skill.Name: TP Recover
skill.Description EN: Increases the amount of TP recovered.

skill.Name: Rebirth
skill.Description EN: Gradually recover HP equal to half theamount of the last damage received.

skill.Name: Rebirth 2
skill.Description EN: Gradually recover HP equal to 1/4 of theamount of the last combo damage received.

skill.Name: Healing Arrow
skill.Description EN: Recover HP when hitting an enemy with an arrow.

skill.Name: Healing Arrow 2
skill.Description EN: Recover TP when hitting an enemy with an arrow.

skill.Name: Lucky Soul
skill.Description EN: Occasionally recover TP when knockedto the ground.

skill.Name: Burst Security
skill.Description EN: Occasionally avoid taking damage after a bad resultfrom a random technique.

skill.Name: Stat Boost
skill.Description EN: Increases the effect of magical status boosts.

skill.Name: OVL Roulette: HP
skill.Description EN: Chance of HP gradually increasing or decreasing duringOver Limit.

skill.Name: OVL Roulette: TP
skill.Description EN: Chance of TP gradually increasing or decreasingduring Over Limit.

skill.Name: OVL Roulette: OVL
skill.Description EN: Chance of Over Limit gauge gradually increasing ordecreasing during Over Limit.

skill.Name: Sleep 'n Heal
skill.Description EN: Gradually recovers HP while under Sleepstatus.

skill.Name: Auto Medicine
skill.Description EN: Occasionally casts healing spells uponreceiving damage.

skill.Name: Auto Medicine 2
skill.Description EN: Occasionally cast status recovery spells uponreceiving damage.

skill.Name: Spirit Absorb
skill.Description EN: Occasionally recovers the same amount of TPused to cast a spell when hit by a spell attack.

skill.Name: Lucky Call
skill.Description EN: Occasionally revives from KO whenLuck is over 100.

skill.Name: Resurrect
skill.Description EN: Occasionally revive from KO automatically.

skill.Name: Angel's Tear
skill.Description EN: Automatically revive from KO once per battle.

skill.Name: Reincarnation
skill.Description EN: Occasionally enter Over Limit upon revival, butrevival spells and items might fail.

skill.Name: HP Surge
skill.Description EN: Revive from KO with full HP regardless of revival method.

skill.Name: TP Surge
skill.Description EN: Revive from KO with full TP regardless of revival method.

skill.Name: Loner
skill.Description EN: All status increases if last one standing onthe battlefield.

skill.Name: Lovely Dog
skill.Description EN: All status increases with Repede in theactive party.

skill.Name: Chivalry
skill.Description EN: Parameters increase according to thenumber of female allies in battle.

skill.Name: Hunter 2
skill.Description EN: Increases EXP earned after defeating anaerial enemy. (Applies to all allies in party.)

skill.Name: Rod
skill.Description EN: Reduces artes TP consumption when a rodis equipped.

skill.Name: Lucky Spear
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases the amount of EXPearned when a spear is equipped.

skill.Name: OVL Bonus
skill.Description EN: Occasionally fully restores HP duringOver Limit.

skill.Name: OVL Bonus 2
skill.Description EN: Occasionally fully restores TP duringOver Limit.

skill.Name: OVL Plus
skill.Description EN: When entering Over Limit, the level entered will be one levelhigher than the amount of gauge used.

skill.Name: OVL Plus 2
skill.Description EN: When entering Over Limit, the level entered will be two levels higher than theamount of gauge used. Duration of the Over Limit is shorter than normal.

skill.Name: OVL Team
skill.Description EN: When entering Over Limit Lv. 1, all nearby allies will also enter Lv. 1.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: OVL Team 2
skill.Description EN: When entering Over Limit Lv. 2, all nearby allies will also enter Lv. 2.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: OVL Team 3
skill.Description EN: When entering Over Limit Lv. 3, all nearby allies will also enter Lv. 3.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: High Heal
skill.Description EN: Occasionally enter Over Limit Lv. 1 after healing 30,000 HP or more in one battle.Duration of Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: Hyper Heal
skill.Description EN: Occasionally enter Over Limit Lv. 2 after healing 50,000 HP or more in one battle.Duration of the Over Limit only lasts half the normal time.

skill.Name: OVL Recover
skill.Description EN: Automatically recover from status effects when entering Over Limit.

skill.Name: Natural Recover
skill.Description EN: Automatically recover from status effects after some time out of battle.

skill.Name: HP Relax
skill.Description EN: Recovers HP gradually by not doing anything in battle.

skill.Name: OVL Relax
skill.Description EN: Fills the OVL gauge gradually by not doinganything in battle.

skill.Name: Taunt
skill.Description EN: Taunt with  to fill the Over Limitgauge. Action differs from Taunt 2.

skill.Name: Taunt 2
skill.Description EN: Taunt with  to fill the Over Limitgauge. Action differs from Taunt.

skill.Name: OVL Taunt
skill.Description EN: Taunt during Over Limit to recover HP.

skill.Name: OVL Taunt 2
skill.Description EN: Taunt during Over Limit to recover TP.

skill.Name: Appeal Target
skill.Description EN: Increases the chance of being targetedby enemies with Taunt.

skill.Name: Temptation
skill.Description EN: Occasionally inflict Confusion on enemyby taunting.

skill.Name: Bark
skill.Description EN: Occasionally cancels all enemy and allyactions with Taunt.

skill.Name: Life Healer
skill.Description EN: Recover HP after a battle.

skill.Name: Spirit Healer
skill.Description EN: Increases TP recovered after battle.

skill.Name: Life Up
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases Max HP after battle.

skill.Name: Mental Up
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases Max TP after battle.

skill.Name: Happiness
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases EXP earned.(Only for characters with this skill set.)

skill.Name: Happiness 2
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases LP earned.(Only for characters with this skill set.)

skill.Name: Happiness 3
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases the amount of Galdafter battle.

skill.Name: Safety
skill.Description EN: Occasionally earn more EXP by finishinga battle without taking any damage.

skill.Name: Technical Half
skill.Description EN: Receive extra TP by not taking damage inbattle. However, all status reduced to half.

skill.Name: Vacance
skill.Description EN: Increases Max HP occasionally if battle iswon without attacking any enemies.

skill.Name: EXP Share
skill.Description EN: Earn bonus EXP without taking part in battle.

skill.Name: Coward
skill.Description EN: Avoids surprise encounters.

skill.Name: Cooking Plus
skill.Description EN: Occasionally increases effect of autocooking after battles.

skill.Name: Treasure Fangs
skill.Description EN: Occasionally receive items dropped byenemies even if escaped from battle.

skill.Name: TP Support
skill.Description EN: TP consumption split with Flynn whenusing base artes near him during battle.

skill.Name: No Artes Plus
skill.Description EN: Increases EXP earned for allies finishing battlewithout using any base or arcane artes.

skill.Name: Sticky Fingers
skill.Description EN: Occasionally steal Gald when escaping from battle.

skill.Name: Stand Alone
skill.Description EN: Only characters equipped with this skill will participate in battle(only works with active characters).

skill.Name: Dispersion
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Can be learnedif used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Great Deluge
skill.Description EN: Changes an arte. Can be learnedif used repeatedly.

skill.Name: Bastion
skill.Description EN: Changes Crushing Eagle To Guardian Field.Can be learned if used repeatedly.
